thread.section_title: LuxHair Wigs Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of LuxHair Wigs | www.luxhair.com
thread.title: Janine Davis
thread.title_full: LuxHair Wigs reviewed by Janine Davis

author: Janine Davis
title: Janine Davis
text: I received my order of 4 LUXHAIR wigs yesterday. After having many disappointments from other wig companies that are from China, I'm quite pleased with the quality and the appearance of the LUXHAIR wigs. The wigs are made of quality materials, the styles of the wigs are stylish. I also like how the wigs are very manageable, you can cut it, and hot curl the wigs according to your styling preference. I'm looking forward to seeing more styles added to Sherri Shepherd's collection.
